NAME: name
SAMPLE_VALUE: Create GitHub Release (if not exists) & attach assets

NAME: DRYRUN
SAMPLE_VALUE: 1   → affiche les commandes, ne modifie rien

NAME: RUN_ID
SAMPLE_VALUE:
$(gh run list --workflow publish.yml --limit 30 --json databaseId,headBranch,createdAt \	./scripts/release.sh	41
env_var	JOB_ID	$(gh run view "${RUN_ID}" --json jobs --jq '.jobs[0].databaseId' || true)"

NAME: TAG
SAMPLE_VALUE: vX.Y.Z pour déclencher le workflow publish)

NAME: MSG
SAMPLE_VALUE: ci: fix publish_testonly.yml (add workflow_dispatch, ensure validity)

NAME: RID
SAMPLE_VALUE:
$(gh run list --workflow ci-pre-commit.yml --branch main \	./tools/watch_head_ci.sh	25
env_var	HEAD	${HEAD_SHA}.

NAME: RID
SAMPLE_VALUE:
$(gh run list --workflow sanity-main.yml --json databaseId,status,conclusion,createdAt \	./tools/ci_show_last_sanity.sh	13
env_var	TMPDIR	$(mktemp -d)"

NAME: RID
SAMPLE_VALUE:
$(gh run list --workflow ci-pre-commit.yml --branch main --limit 30 \	./tools/fix_ci_and_run.sh	203
env_var	RID	$(printf "%s\n" "$RID" | sed '/^$/d' | tail -n1)"
